Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.

Salutations, {STR_LeaderName}! Your enlightened presence is a welcome breath of fresh air in these uncivilized lands. What do you say we discuss the works of Candrice and Ontara? Or do your duties force you to speak to us of more profane matters?
你好，{STR_LeaderName}！你的大驾光临犹如一缕清风，给这片荒蛮之地带来了无限启迪。你说我们来探讨一下坎蒂瑞斯与奥塔拉的作品如何？或者说你出于职责所迫，需要跟我们谈谈更加世俗的事务？
By courtesy of the Prefect, we shall grant you this favor, {STR_LeaderName}.
承蒙星长的好意，我们会帮你这个忙的，{STR_LeaderName}。

Peace be upon you, {STR_LeaderName}. You have come before the benevolent Paragon, heirs of the grand and noble Star Union. Chosen by the Emperor himself, we were destined to become the exemplars of human perfection. Today, in these barbaric times, the Paragon are the last line between anarchy and civilization. Tell us, have you come here to aid us in this righteous cause?
愿你平安，{STR_LeaderName}。在你面前的是伟大、高贵而仁慈的星际联盟后嗣：完人。帝皇亲自选中了我们，我们命中注定会成为完美人类的典范。在如今这个野蛮愚昧的时代中，完人是阻止文明堕入混沌的最后一条防线。告诉我们，你来此是为了帮助我们实现这一正义事业的吗？
Excellent! We expected nothing less from you, {STR_LeaderName}. To formalize and consolidate our future cooperation, we ask you to take care of an urgent matter that needs addressing.
太棒了！你果然不同凡响，{STR_LeaderName}。为了正式确定并巩固我们未来的合作，我们希望你处理一件紧急事务。
The vulture has returned to its nest. {STR_LeaderName}, have you come here to end this madness and apologize to my people?
秃鹫已经回巢。{STR_LeaderName}，你是来结束这场疯狂并向我的人民道歉的吗？

The light of the morning star has thrice touched the surface of {STR_PlanetName}. The constellations of Mora promise a fortunate day, and {STR_LeaderName} has come to the Paragon to talk about our future. Is that not why you are here, my friend?
晨星之光已经三次触及{STR_PlanetName}的表面。莫拉星座预言了一个幸运日，而{STR_LeaderName}来到了完人身旁想要谈论我们的未来。这难道不是你来这里的原因吗，我的朋友？
Very well, we will act accordingly.
非常好，我们会采取相应行动。
The vulture has emerged victorious. Please accept our surrender, {STR_LeaderName}, and stop this unneccessary bloodshed.
秃鹫胜利了。请接受我们的投降，{STR_LeaderName}，避免更多不必要的牺牲。

Hold it right there, {STR_LeaderName}! Under the Prefect’s law, and thus under the law of the old Emperors, it is strictly forbidden to venture into our territory while armed! Tell us, why do you bring weapons to our doorsteps?
待在那儿别动，{STR_LeaderName}！根据星长和古老帝皇们制定的法律，严禁携带武器闯入我方领地！告诉我们，你为什么带着武器出现在我们家门口？
Under formal protest, we will meet your brash demands, {STR_LeaderName}.
虽然我们并不情愿，但我们会满足你无礼的要求，{STR_LeaderName}。

Halt, {STR_LeaderName}! you have come before the Paragon, heirs of the grand and noble Star Union. Chosen by the Emperor himself, the Paragon were destined to become the exemplars of human perfection. Today, in these barbaric times, we are the last line between anarchy and civilization. Speak quickly: Will you lend your armies to our cause, or have you come here to defy us?
站住，{STR_LeaderName}！在你面前的是伟大、高贵而仁慈的星际联盟后嗣：完人。帝皇亲自选中了我们，我们命中注定会成为完美人类的典范。在如今这个野蛮愚昧的时代中，完人是阻止文明堕入混沌的最后一条防线。快说：你会把军队借给我们并帮助我们的事业吗？还是说你是来反抗我们的？

Bold words spoken with true confidence. Though you will find that challenges can take many forms. There is an urgent problem that needs to be handled. Resolve it and this could be the start of a friendship of strength between our people.
豪言壮语源于真正的自信。不过你会发现挑战总是千变万化的。现在有一个问题亟待处理，解决它将会是我们双方建立深厚友谊的开始。
Greetings, what do you wish to discuss?

The reflections of the evening star have crimsoned the sky of {STR_PlanetName}. The constellations of Mora stand troubled and wary, and {STR_LeaderName} has come to the Paragon to talk about our future. Tell us, what is it that you wish to discuss?
{STR_PlanetName}的天空在昏星的映照下变得深红。莫拉星座谨慎而不安，{STR_LeaderName}来到了完人面前想要谈论我们的未来。告诉我们，你想要谈些什么？
我们能够接受这些条款。
In light of your superior forces, we must admit defeat, {STR_LeaderName}. We urge you to end this slaughter and accept our surrender.
你确实技高一筹，我们必须承认失败，{STR_LeaderName}。我们强烈要求你停止这场屠杀，接受我们的投降。

Greetings, {STR_LeaderName}! Your actions on {STR_PlanetName} have been closely observed by the Prefect. He believes that with our guidance there may yet be hope for you and your kind. Tell us, what is it that you want today?
你好，{STR_LeaderName}！星长密切关注着你在{STR_PlanetName}上的行动。他相信，在我们的指引下，你和你的族人可能仍然具有希望。告诉我们，你今天想要什么？
By courtesy of the Prefect, we shall grant you this favor, {STR_LeaderName}.
承蒙星长的好意，我们会帮你这个忙的，{STR_LeaderName}。

Salutations, {STR_LeaderName}. Bow before the mighty Paragon, heirs of the grand and noble Star Union. Chosen by the Emperor himself we were destined to become the exemplars of human perfection. Today, in these barbaric times, the Paragon are the last line between anarchy and civilization. Tell us your intentions, {STR_LeaderName}, and we will judge your worth.
你好，{STR_LeaderName}。臣服于伟大而高贵的星际联盟后裔吧。在帝皇的钦点下，我们注定会成为完美人类的典范。在如今这个野蛮愚昧的时代中，完人是阻止文明堕入混沌的最后一条防线。告诉我们你的意图，{STR_LeaderName}，由我们来判断你的价值。
Promising words, although their truthfulness still remains to be proven. Let your actions speak, {STR_LeaderName}! Serve the will of the Paragon and you shall be rewarded with our favor.
话虽好听，但是否属实仍待考证。用行动说话，{STR_LeaderName}！臣服于完人的意志，你将得到我们的恩惠，
Ha! We knew your troops would be no match for our augmented soldiers! Is that not why you have come here, {STR_LeaderName}? To negotiate your unconditional surrender?
哈！我们就知道你的部队根本不是我们强化士兵的对手！你是来提出无条件投降的吧，{STR_LeaderName}？这难道不是你来此的原因吗？

The trail of the venturing star has twice crossed the horizon of {STR_PlanetName}. The constellations of Mora foretell an eventful day, and {STR_LeaderName} has come to the Paragon to talk about our future. That is why you are here, isn’t it?
冒险之星的轨迹已两次越过{STR_PlanetName}的地平线。莫拉星座预言了一个重要的日子，而{STR_LeaderName}来到了完人身边想要谈论我们的未来。这就是你来此的原因，不是吗？
We can agree with these changes.
我们能够接受这些变更。
We were mistaken to underestimate you, {STR_LeaderName}. You have proven your superiority on the battlefield, and we urge you to stop this war and put our past differences behind us.
我们错误地低估了你，{STR_LeaderName}。你用事实证明了你在战场上的超然卓越，我们强烈要求你停止这场战争，将我们之间的分歧抛诸脑后。
We will aid you in your cause and together we shall prosper.
我们将帮助你成就事业。齐心协力，我们将走向繁荣。
I kindly ask you to withdraw from this location. {INT_Cost}[influence/]
{INT_Cost} is replaced by an integer that gives the Influence - a resource in the game - that this actions costs. This is followed by the influence icon.
Is there anything we can accommodate you with?
有什么需要我们帮忙的吗？
我们的仁慈是有限度的。
We kindly request an audience with your Prefect.
我们请求觐见你们的星长。
Allow us to stand against our enemies with combined forces.
让我们同仇敌忾，联手抗敌吧。
I will help you. There is no challenge my armies cannot overcome!
我会帮助你们的。没有我的军队完不成的挑战！
You had better withdraw now, unless you want to find out! {INT_Cost}[influence/]
你最好马上撤军，否则后果自负！{INT_Cost}[influence/]
{INT_Cost} is replaced by an integer that gives the Influence - a resource in the game - that this actions costs. This is followed by the influence icon.
My people are looking for a challenge!
我们的人正在寻求挑战！
The Paragon will tremble before our might!
完人将在我们的力量面前颤抖！
This had better not be easy!
No one can weather the might of our combined forces!
没有人能够抵挡我们联合起来的部队！
Salutations, Paragon. Our intentions are to offer you our aid.
你们好，完人。我们是来为你们提供帮助的。
We require this location, please vacate. {INT_Cost}[influence/]
这里是我们的地盘，请离开。{INT_Cost}[influence/]
{INT_Cost} is replaced by an integer that gives the Influence - a resource in the game - that this actions costs. This is followed by the influence icon.
Are there any issues you require our assistance with?
有什么困难需要我们帮忙的吗？
Your quest for human perfection ends now.
你们对完美的追求将在此终结。
We wish to talk to your Prefect.
我们希望与你们的星长谈谈。
用你的意志给予我们启迪。
Would the mighty Paragon join us in our war efforts?
强大的完人会与我们并肩作战吗？
我们来讨论一下交易的事宜吧。
Your actions haven’t gone unnoticed recently, and it appears that you have been helping our rivals. I hope this will not continue in the future.
你最近的行动并非无人知晓，你似乎一直在帮助我们的对手。我不希望今后再看到这种情况发生。

The time has come to put the rabble down once and for all. We gave you every opportunity to pave the way for good relations, {STR_LeaderName}, but we see now that our goals were never aligned. Your people won’t see another dawn and your cities will be torn down in the name of the Prefect. When next we meet, it will be on the battlefield.
现在是彻底消灭这些乌合之众的时候了。{STR_LeaderName}，我们给了你无数次机会为友好关系铺设道路，但我们现在总算明白了我们的徒劳。我们要以星长的名义摧毁你的城市，你的人民将看不到明天的太阳。下次相遇，我们将在战场上兵刃相见。

It seems that our relations have changed recently. The Paragon would hope that in the future we may pave the way for better diplomacy and civility. Let us wipe the slate clean, and work for prosperity in the future.
我们的关系最近似乎发生了变化。完人希望我们在未来可以拥有更好的外交关系，让文明繁荣发展。让我们重归于好，为未来的繁荣而努力吧。
For this faction's narrative style and in world references, please check the glossay delivered as part of the documentation.
In the lines below, {STR_LeaderName} is replaced by the name of the player's avatar.

In the lines below, text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
